snippet: Two of three winning tickets in the $448 million Powerball jackpot this week were sold in the state, including one in a coastal town hit hard by Hurricane Sandy.
abstract: Two of three winning tickets in $448 million Powerball jackpot were sold in New Jersey, including one in coastal town of Little Egg Harbor, which was hit hard by Hurricane Sandy.
lead_paragraph: Two of three winning tickets in the $448 million Powerball jackpot this week were sold in the state, including one in a coastal town hit hard by Hurricane Sandy.

headline.main: In Powerball, Luck Is With New Jersey
headline.print_headline: In Powerball, Luck Is With New Jersey
